desaddvideobutton.description: Show the add button from this YouTube video.

desambilight.description: Show you the ambilight effect of the current playing video.
desambilight.message: Show you the ambilight effect of the current playing video.

desambilightrangeblurradius.description: If set a lower value the shadow will be sharp, the higher the number, the more blurred it will be.
desambilightrangeblurradius.message: If set to a lower value the shadow will be sharp, the higher the number, the more blurred it will be.

desambilightrangespreadradius.description: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.
desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.

desambilightvarcolor.description: Take the color from the video.
desambilightvarcolor.message: Take the color from the video.

desautoplay.description: Automatically dim the background when you click the play button and versus.
desautoplay.message: Automaatselt tumenda tausta kui klõpsate mängi nuppu ja vastupidi.

descontextmenus.description: Show the context menu to focus an item.

description.description: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.
description.message: Kogu lehekülg tumeneb, nii et saate vaadata videot, justkui oleksite kinos.

desenterpassword.description: Enter you password in the inputbox here below:
desenterpassword.message: Enter you password in the inputbox here below:

deseyea.description: Automatically dim the background when opening a page.
deseyea.message: Automaatselt tumenda taust kui avatakse leht.

deseyealist.description: Automatically dim the background when open the following page:
deseyealist.message: Automaatselt tumenda taust järgmise lehe avamisel:

deseyen.description: Normal use (lights go out when you click on the lamp icon).
deseyen.message: Tavaline kasutamine (tuled kustuvad kui klõpsate lambi ikooni).

deseyetimesaver.description: When the page is inactive (no mouse movement), it go automatic dark in the chosen seconds.
deseyetimesaver.message: When the page is inactive (no mouse movement), it go automatic dark in the chosen seconds.

deshardflash.description: Show all Flash objects, and skip the URL control. So website ads may also show up.
deshardflash.message: Show all Flash objects, and skip the URL control. So website ads may also show up.

deshead.description: Show the YouTube Channel bar or the name.
deshead.message: Näita YouTube Channel baari või nimi.

desinfobar.description: Show the description information about the video.

deslikebar.description: Show the like/dislike bar from this YouTube video.
deslikebar.message: Näita selle vidoe meeldib & ei meeldi arvu YouTube'is.

deslikebutton.description: Show the like & dislike buttons of YouTube for this video.
deslikebutton.message: Näita selle video meeldib & ei meeldi nuppe.

desmousespotlighta.description: If the light is off, show a spotlight around the mouse cursor.
desmousespotlighta.message: If the light is off, show a spotlight around the mouse cursor.

desmousespotlightc.description: If the light is off, you can select an area to focus a item.
desmousespotlightc.message: Kui tuled on väljas, saad sa valida ala, millele keskenduda.

desmousespotlightt.description: If the light is off, click through the element.
desmousespotlightt.message: If the light is off, click through the element.

despassword.description: When the lights go back on, it ask you to enter your password.
despassword.message: When the lights go back on, it ask you to enter your password.

desplaylist.description: Show the YouTube playlist on the YouTube website.

desreadera.description: Always show the dimness level bar when the lights go out.
desreadera.message: Alati näita hämaruse taset kui tuled kustuvad.

desreadern.description: Never show the dimness level bar.
desreadern.message: Ära kunagi näita hämaruse tugevuse riba.

dessharebutton.description: Show the share buttons of YouTube for this video.
dessharebutton.message: Näita Youtube'i jagamisnuppe selle video puhul.

desshortcutlight.description: to turn the lights on or off.
desshortcutlight.message: et lülitada tuled sisse või välja.

dessuggestions.description: Show the suggestions of the YouTube website.

destime.description: Lights off between the follow time:

desvideoheadline.description: Show and invert the color of the video title.
desvideoheadline.message: Näita ja pööratakse värvi video pealkiri.

desviewcount.description: Show the number of view for this video.

donatepromotext.description: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!
donatepromotext.message: Kui saate teha annetuse mistahes summas, ma hindan seda tohutult!

eastereggsquestion.description: Do you like a real movie theater?
eastereggsquestion.message: Do you like a real movie theater?

helpautoplay.description: The 'Eye protection' option is enable, to use the below feature. Disable the 'Eye Protection' option.
helpautoplay.message: The 'Eye protection' option is enable, to use the below feature. Disable the 'Eye Protection' option.

helpeyeprotection.description: When you enable the 'Eye protection' option, it will default disable the 'Auto Play' option.
helpeyeprotection.message: When you enable the 'Eye protection' option, it will default disable the 'Auto Play' option.

reportbug.description: Report an Issue of my extension

textfoot.message: See tarkvara on litsentseeritud CC-GNU GPL. Et vaadata käesoleva Litsentsi koopiat, külastage

titeldownloadupgrade.description: This upgrade add support for focus the selected image. And show a gallery of the images on that webpage.
titeldownloadupgrade.message: This upgrade add support for focus the selected image. And show a gallery of the images on that webpage.

warningtextambilight.description: If it's impossible to show the real ambilight because of security rule. It will show the one solid color effect.
warningtextambilight.message: If it's impossible to show the real ambilight because of security rule. It will show the one solid color effect.
